LLE.llesolver module¶

class LLE.llesolver.LLEsovler(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to solver the Lugiato Lefever Equation Initialization input ([]=facultative): - res <dict>:

  • Qi <float>: intrinisic Q of the resonator
  • Qc <float>: coupling Q of the resonator
  • R <float>: ring radius
  • V <float>: mode volume
  • n2 <float>: Non linear index of the material
  • sim <dict>:
    • Tscan <float>: length of the simulation (in unit of round trip)
    • μ_fit <list>: number of mode to fit
    • μ_sim <list>: number of mode to simulate
    • dispfile <str> : str pointing to a .mat file where the resonances
      and corresponding azimuthal mode orders are saved
    • [δω_init] <float>: initial detuning of the pump
    • [δω_end] <float>: final detuning of the pump
    • [δω_stop] <float>: where to stop the scan in detuning but keep
      doing the simulation
  • [sim_norm] <dict>:
    • F2 <float>: normalize pump intensity
    • α_init <float>: normalize initialize detuning of the pump
    • α_end <float>: normalize final detuning of the pump
    • α_stop <float>: normalize where to stop the scan in detuning
      but keep doing the simulation
